page.title: 13TRADE
page.content: We have three small shopping areas as well as the easily accessible large town centre .In the survey we discovered that older people found these facilities quite adequate,while others had to go further afield for their needs.All these areas have at least one fish and chip shop while only one area has a chemist (it has two). Many people felt that a chemist in the other areas was needed.All areas have food shops and also some form of craft or recreational shop.Most people feel that bigger shops should be brought into the town. There are three sub-post offices,a couple of hardware stores and other specialist shops to cater for the varing needs of the community.
